li.text: ModelMuse does not currently support parameter estimation of models that employ local grid-refinement such as MODFLOW-LGR (Mehl and Hill, 2013).

ModelMuse does not currently support parameter estimation of PHAST (Parkhurst and others, 2004), MT3DMS (Zheng and Wang, 1999), MT3D-USGS (Bedekar and others, 2016), or MODPATH (Pollock, 2016) models.
ModelMuse was not specifically designed to support the use of PEST++ (White and others, 2020). However, the PEST control file generated by ModelMuse can be used with PEST++.
ModelMuse can only import MODFLOW-2005 and MODFLOW-NWT models even though it can be used for parameter estimation for other MODFLOW-2005 based models such as MODFLOW-OWHM (Hanson and others, 2015).
